titleStmt.title: The benefit that Christians receiue by Iesus Christ crucified translated out of French into English, by A.G.
titleStmt.author: Paleario, Aonio, 1503-1570.
Golding, Arthur, 1536-1606.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted at London at the three cranes in the vintree, for George Bishop and Thomas Woodcocke,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Paleario by STC (2nd ed.). and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Translation of the French translation of the Italian edition.--Cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.

place.placeName: London at the three cranes in the vintree
